subSubSection.paragraph:
Chilean hosts:
Caracara plancus plancus (Miller, 1777)
;
Milvago chimango chimango (Vieillot 1816)
;
Milvago chimango temucoensis (Sclater, 1918)
.
Geographic distribution: Central and South America.

Remarks: Antofagasta , Concepción and Chiloé are new locality records for
Colpocephalum maculatum
in Chile , based on samples from
Milvago chimango temucoensis
and
Caracara plancus plancus
held in MONZ and NHML (
Shchedrina et al. 2017
), respectively.
San-Martín-Órdenes et al . (2005: 51
, 53) provided population parameters for 4707 specimens of
Colpocephalum maculatum
collected from 23
Milvago chimango chimango
.
